The '''Geoculus''' (plural '''Geoculi''') is an Adventure Item that can be found scattered across [[Liyue]]. Geoculi can be offered to any [[Statue of The Seven]] in Liyue for rewards, are limited and do not respawn, can only be found in the overworld, and will not appear in [[Chests]].

When an overworld Geoculus is within close proximity of a player, an icon will appear on their minimap along with a sound effect. Players can also use a [[Geoculus Resonance Stone]] to mark the location of a Geoculus on the map.

131 Geoculi can be found in the overworld, allowing a player to fully level up the Statues of The Seven in Liyue with one Geoculus to spare.
